document_data.caption: Elven Port in the High Forest.
document_data.name: Elven Port
document_data.mainbody: '''Elven Port''' was a flourishing [[elf|elven]] city that stood at the edges of the [[High Forest]].
document_data.Description: Its piers were wetted by the river [[Delimbiyr]]. Elven Port was long one of the most accessible ruins of old [[Earlann]] and it was visited by several groups of adventurers. For many years, the ruins of Elven Port had provided cover to marauders and a few predators. However, by [[1366 DR]], the old tower of the town's lord was occupied by a powerful group of [[daemonfey]], led by [[Vaerilmor Floshin]]. Vaerilmor and his followers were luring elven adventurers to corrupt them with their foul [[magic]].
document_data.History: Between [[1366 DR]] and [[1372 DR]], all the adventurers who came across this place disappeared without leaving any traces.
